Text: The Outrage (Marcus Welby, M.D.):  The episode, which originally aired October 8, 1974, sparked controversy and anger for its equation of homosexuality to pedophilia.
Triplets:<The Outrage

Text: The Outrage (Marcus Welby, M.D.):  "The Outrage" was targeted for protests by LGBT rights groups and several network affiliates refused to broadcast it.
